wikitext.*:
'''Sandheaver''' was a common family name among the [[Bree-hobbits]].<ref>{{FR|I9}}</ref>
==Etymology==
The etymology of the name is not explained, but obviously it contains ''sand'' and ''[[Wiktionary:heave#Verb|heave]]'', referring to someone who lifts and carries sand. If so, it possibly refers to someone who burrows a [[Hobbit-hole]], such as those on the slopes of the [[Bree-hill]].
